text:
JDiff (http://jdiff.sourceforge.net) prepares a report documenting the API differences between two 
releases.  In preparation for 1.3, it would be helpful to use this tool to identify the intentional and 
inadvertant API changes since 1.2.  Use of JDiff was discussed in http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?
l=log4j-dev&m=111654308525630&w=2

To use: 

Extract jdiff and logging-log4j-1.2.11.tar.gz (or zip) to user home directory
cd ~/logging-log4j
ant jdiff
open build/jdiff/changes.html

Location of jdiff and reference version can be overriden using -DJDIFF_HOME=path and -Dreference-
version.dir=path respectively.
creator: carnold@apache.org
carnold@apache.org
text: jdiff target also added to 1.2 branch of build.xml so we can check for API changes on 1.2.12.
